 27 #pragma once
 28 
 29 #include "FetchHeaders.h"
 30 #include "FetchOptions.h"
 31 #include "ResourceRequest.h"
 32 #include "ResourceResponse.h"
 33 #include "SharedBuffer.h"
 34 #include <wtf/CompletionHandler.h>
 35 
 36 namespace WebCore {
 37 
 38 class ScriptExecutionContext;
 39 
 40 struct CacheQueryOptions;
 41 
 42 namespace DOMCacheEngine {
 43 
 44 enum class Error {
 45     NotImplemented,
 46     ReadDisk,
 47     WriteDisk,
 48     QuotaExceeded,
 49     Internal,
 50     Stopped
 51 };
 52 
 53 Exception convertToException(Error);
 54 Exception convertToExceptionAndLog(ScriptExecutionContext*, Error);
 55 
 56 WEBCORE_EXPORT bool queryCacheMatch(const ResourceRequest& request, const ResourceRequest& cachedRequest, const ResourceResponse&, const CacheQueryOptions&);
 57 WEBCORE_EXPORT bool queryCacheMatch(const ResourceRequest& request, const URL& url, bool hasVaryStar, const HashMap<String, String>& varyHeaders, const CacheQueryOptions&);
 58 
 59 using ResponseBody = Variant<std::nullptr_t, Ref<FormData>, Ref<SharedBuffer>>;
 60 ResponseBody isolatedResponseBody(const ResponseBody&);
 61 WEBCORE_EXPORT ResponseBody copyResponseBody(const ResponseBody&);
 62 
 63 struct Record {
 64     WEBCORE_EXPORT Record copy() const;
 65 
 66     uint64_t identifier;
 67     uint64_t updateResponseCounter;
 68 
 69     FetchHeaders::Guard requestHeadersGuard;
 70     ResourceRequest request;
 71     FetchOptions options;
 72     String referrer;
 73 
 74     FetchHeaders::Guard responseHeadersGuard;
 75     ResourceResponse response;
 76     ResponseBody responseBody;
 77     uint64_t responseBodySize;
 78 };
 79 
 80 struct CacheInfo {
 81     uint64_t identifier;
 82     String name;
 83 };
 84 
 85 struct CacheInfos {
 86     CacheInfos isolatedCopy();
 87 
 88     template<class Encoder> void encode(Encoder&) const;
 89     template<class Decoder> static Optional<CacheInfos> decode(Decoder&);
 90 
 91     Vector<CacheInfo> infos;
 92     uint64_t updateCounter;
 93 };
 94 
 95 struct CacheIdentifierOperationResult {
 96     template<class Encoder> void encode(Encoder&) const;
 97     template<class Decoder> static Optional<CacheIdentifierOperationResult> decode(Decoder&);
 98 
 99     uint64_t identifier { 0 };
100     // True in case storing cache list on the filesystem failed.
101     bool hadStorageError { false };
102 };
103 
104 using CacheIdentifierOrError = Expected<CacheIdentifierOperationResult, Error>;
105 using CacheIdentifierCallback = CompletionHandler<void(const CacheIdentifierOrError&)>;
106 
107 using RecordIdentifiersOrError = Expected<Vector<uint64_t>, Error>;
108 using RecordIdentifiersCallback = CompletionHandler<void(RecordIdentifiersOrError&&)>;
109 
110 
111 using CacheInfosOrError = Expected<CacheInfos, Error>;
112 using CacheInfosCallback = CompletionHandler<void(CacheInfosOrError&&)>;
113 
114 using RecordsOrError = Expected<Vector<Record>, Error>;
115 using RecordsCallback = CompletionHandler<void(RecordsOrError&&)>;
116 
117 using CompletionCallback = CompletionHandler<void(Optional<Error>&&)>;
118 
119 template<class Encoder> inline void CacheInfos::encode(Encoder& encoder) const
120 {
121     encoder << infos;
122     encoder << updateCounter;
123 }
124 
125 template<class Decoder> inline Optional<CacheInfos> CacheInfos::decode(Decoder& decoder)
126 {
127     Optional<Vector<CacheInfo>> infos;
128     decoder >> infos;
129     if (!infos)
130         return WTF::nullopt;
131 
132     Optional<uint64_t> updateCounter;
133     decoder >> updateCounter;
134     if (!updateCounter)
135         return WTF::nullopt;
136 
137     return {{ WTFMove(*infos), WTFMove(*updateCounter) }};
138 }
139 
140 template<class Encoder> inline void CacheIdentifierOperationResult::encode(Encoder& encoder) const
141 {
142     encoder << identifier;
143     encoder << hadStorageError;
144 }
145 
146 template<class Decoder> inline Optional<CacheIdentifierOperationResult> CacheIdentifierOperationResult::decode(Decoder& decoder)
147 {
148     Optional<uint64_t> identifier;
149     decoder >> identifier;
150     if (!identifier)
151         return WTF::nullopt;
152 
153     Optional<bool> hadStorageError;
154     decoder >> hadStorageError;
155     if (!hadStorageError)
156         return WTF::nullopt;
157     return {{ WTFMove(*identifier), WTFMove(*hadStorageError) }};
158 }
159 
160 } // namespace DOMCacheEngine
161 
162 } // namespace WebCore
163 
164 namespace WTF {
165 template<> struct EnumTraits<WebCore::DOMCacheEngine::Error> {
166     using values = EnumValues<
167         WebCore::DOMCacheEngine::Error,
168         WebCore::DOMCacheEngine::Error::NotImplemented,
169         WebCore::DOMCacheEngine::Error::ReadDisk,
170         WebCore::DOMCacheEngine::Error::WriteDisk,
171         WebCore::DOMCacheEngine::Error::QuotaExceeded,
172         WebCore::DOMCacheEngine::Error::Internal
173     >;
174 };
175 }
